topic.title: Completing the Mingle configuration wizard
topic.p: After you've setup a database, downloaded and installed Mingle, you're ready to open a web browser and complete the Mingle configuration wizard.
topic.note: If you want Mingle to be able to send email, you will need to know the details of an existing SMTP (outbound email) server. If you don't have these details, please contact your organization's email server administrator.

section.title: Getting started...
section.hint: Please be aware that the database needs to be setup prior to install Mingle.
section.p: The Welcome to Mingle page should open in your browser automatically at this stage.
If you have the database ready, select the checkbox. Then the Continue button will be enabled to allow you to proceed with the installation.
